title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 324.4 - Mandatory membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 324.4 - Mandatory membership

State Regulations

Those persons who are deemed to be in full-time employment
pursuant to section
324.3
of this Part shall be
mandatory members of the New York State Employees' Retirement

System. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
324.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
